title: Patrick Dempsey has found his first post-Grey's Anatomy role
content:
By Shelli Weinstein,

Patrick Dempsey is officially moving on from Grey's Anatomy. Our dear McDreamy is currently in final talks to join Bridget Jones's Baby, Deadline reports.

We don't know anything about who he'll play, or much about the movie's plot, but the new sequel to Bridget Jones's Diary 

Our best guess? Dempsey could be the next Hugh Grant-style love interest. What we do know is that the movie is not based on Bridget Jones creator Helen Fielding's latest novel, Mad About The Boy, which finds Bridget with kids after Darcy's death.

Hit the comments with your hopes for the movie's story. Who do you want Patrick Dempsey to play?

Ellen Pompeo speaks out on Patrick Dempsey's Grey's Anatomy exit. Watch here.
